title: ‘Deep concern’ over coronavirus emergency powers
description: Hungary’s Prime Minister Viktor Orban took sweeping new powers to fight the virus on Monday.
content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 Hungary was not singled out but there has been widespread condemnation of the sweeping powers handed to the prime minister
